name: FX 1-Hour Bollinger/RSI Mean-Reverter
description: A conservative mean-reversion strategy operating on 1-hour candles of major forex pairs (EUR/USD, GBP/USD, USD/JPY). It buys when price is oversold below the lower 20-period Bollinger Band with RSI(14) <30 and shorts when price is overbought above the upper band with RSI>70. Exits are triggered at the Bollinger mid-line or RSI mean-reversion levels. Risk is capped to 2 % of equity per position, with a volatility-based ATR stop (1.5×ATR20) and a take-profit 1.5× the initial risk (2.25×ATR20). Only one position per symbol is allowed, aligning with the conservative mandate.
